entry.dc:title: Software Reviews : Ci2 SYSTEM 100, Version 1.1

Software Reviews : The Confidence Factor: The Decision-Maker's Tool Kit Publisher: Simple Software, Inc., 2 Pinewood Rd., Irvine CA 92714 (telephone: 714-857-9179) Year of Publication: 1983 Materials: One 5-¼ inch diskette and a 97-page manual. Price: $389 for a single license; additional educational licenses are available for $50 each. Machine Specificity: The program is available for computers running PC-DOS 1.1 or 2.0, some MS-DOS systems, and a few CP/M systems. It runs well on IBM-PC and compatibles, and Zenith Z-100 micros. System Requirements: 128K RAM, and one disk drive (two drives preferred) Effectiveness: Very good. Documentation: Adequate for those who are already familiar with the analytic techniques, but cannot be used as a means of learning them. Examples are all from private sector applications, so some creativity is required to apply the techniques to public-sector problems.
entry.dc:creator: Portney K.

entry.dc:title: Software Reviews : Concepts Computerized Atlas Reviewed by Debra Daggs and Anthony Williams, The Pennsylvania State University Publisher: Software Concepts, Incorporated, Stamford, CT 06905 (telephone: 800-782-4567) Year of Publication: 1985 Materials: One disk and one instruction booklet Price: $69.95Machine Specificity: Macintosh, IBM PC and compatibles System Requirements: 128K Effectiveness: Good User-Friendliness: Good Documentation: Good

Software Reviews : Stat 1Publisher: Sugar Mill Software Corp., 1180 Kika Place, Kailua, HI 96734 (telephone: 808-261-7536) Year of Publication: 1985 Materials: One program diskette, one data diskette, 264-page manual Price: $129.95 professional rate; $500.00 unlimited machine lab installation; individual student version (will save only 100 cases) $29.95; extra copies of the manual $15.95 Machine Specificity: IBM PC, XT, or AT or 99% compatible PC-DOS or MS-DOS machines System requirements: 256K memory and either two floppy disk drives or one floppy and one hard disk drive. Effectiveness: Good User-Friendliness: Excellent Documentation: Excellent
entry.dc:creator: Bretschneider S.

entry.dc:title: Software Reviews : Plague Fighter Reviewed by James B. Schick, Pittsburg State University, Kansas Publisher: Krell Software, 1320 Stony Brook Road, Stony Brook, NY 11790 (telephone: 516-751-5139, 800-245-7355) Year of Publication: 1985 Materials: One simulation disk in paper cover, instruction booklet Price: $49.95 Machine Specificity: A company representative advised that the Apple II and Commodore 64 versions are now on the market, with versions for TRS-80 Model III and mum PC and compatibles yet to come. System Requirements: 48K, standard computer in relevant model type; color monitor enhances graphic images but is certainly not necessary Effectiveness: Good as a game, fair as an educational tool User-Friendliness: Good Documentation: Very good for the game, only fair for instructional purposes

Software Reviews : 1St-Class Staff review Publisher: Programs in Motion, 10 Sycamore Road, Wayland, MA 01778 (telephone: 617-655-6005) Year of Publication: 1985 Materials: Unlocked program disk; 127-page manual in 3-ring binder; slipcase Price: $495 ($100 to educational institutions in lots of 10 or more), including Runtime Program and distribution license, allowing unlimited distribution of an expert system developed by the user (not distribution of 1ST-CLASS itself); $50 for limited-scope version allowing 5 factors, 6 values, 10 examples, with price applicable to full system; 10% educational discount when requested by an educational institution; multiple copy sales to a single educational unit discounted by arrangement. Machine Specificity: IBM PC and compatibles System Requirements: 256K memory Effectiveness: Excellent User-Friendliness: Good Documentation: Good

Software Reviews : The Congressional Bill Simulator Reviewed by: Stan Ricketts, Baptist College at Charleston Publisher: Focus Media, Inc., 839 Stewart Avenue, P.O. Box 865, Garden City, NY 11530 (telephone: 516-794-8900) Year of Publication: 1985 Materials: Disk, backup disk, manual Price: $148.00 Machine Specificity: Apple IIe System Requirements: 64K Apple IIe, 1 disk drive Effectiveness: Excellent User-Friendliness: Excellent Documentation: Good

Software Reviews : THOR, Version 1.83 Publisher: Fastware, Inc., 200 Freeway Drive East, East Orange, NJ 07018 (telephone: 201-676-7963) Year of Publication: 1984 Materials: 1 program disk, 1 demonstration disk Price: $295 Machine Specificity: IBM PC and compatibles System Requirements: 128K RAM (larger RAM is highly desirable), two 320K disk drives Effectiveness: Good User-Friendliness: Excellent Documentation: Excellent
entry.dc:creator: Schutt R.K.

entry.dc:title: Software Reviews : Statistical Software Tools (SST), Version 1.0 Reviewed by Robert G. Brookshire, North Texas State University Publisher: Dubin/Rivers Research, 1510 Ontario Avenue, Pasadena, CA 91103 (telephone: 818-577-8361) Year of Publication: 1986 Materials: One diskette (not copy protected), one spiral-bound manual Price: $100.00 System Requirements: IBM PC, XT, AT and compatibles with 384K RAM, PC- or MS-DOS 2.0 or higher. Numeric coprocessor recommended Effectiveness: Good User-Friendliness: Fair Documentation: Fair
